name: Vertical Integration
description: Own every part of your supply chain—from raw materials to distribution—to eliminate middlemen.
executionSteps: Identify which parts you don't yet control
Acquire or develop in-house alternatives for those parts
Optimize for cost savings and reliability
Integrate all operations under one brand or holding company

name: Predatory Pricing
description: Lower your prices to undercut competitors, drive them out, then consolidate and increase prices after dominance.
executionSteps: Cut prices below profitability threshold—sustain with war chest
Monitor which competitors fold or seek buyout
Acquire or absorb them at minimal cost
Gradually reset pricing after market control is secured

name: Acquisition Expansion
description: Buy out fragmented competitors to consolidate power and centralize pricing decisions.
executionSteps: Create a map of the fragmented market players
Approach with acquisition offers or leverage debt positions
Absorb assets, teams, or customers into a unified system
Streamline operations under single governance and branding
